title: Igniting Innovation: Bilikisu Wunmi Olatunji’s Journey with Abuja’s Thriving R User Community
text: The R Consortium recently caught up with Bilikisu Wunmi Olatunji, founder of the Abuja R User Group and R-Ladies Abuja. Bilikisu shared they began conducting in-person meetups last month by adding new types of gatherings, such as focus groups, quarterly workshops, and more. The October event was a success, as the group now has members from diverse fields, including a lawyer. Currently, the group is planning more exciting events for the upcoming year. Read more here

title: Abuja R User Group
text:
About Abuja R User Group
Abuja RUG is a community of R users both from the industry and academia. The community encompasses users at all skill levels based in Abuja, FCT, Nigeria. We meet to learn, mentor and discuss R-related topics and to promote the use of R.
Our mission is build a strong community of Data Science, AI and ML professional and academics using R in Abuja through collaboration, mentorship seminars, training and conferences.
Experienced Academics and Professionals volunteer in webinars, seminars and classes to help, teach and mentor upcoming Researchers, Data Scientist, Data Analytics.

title: R/Python Shiny
text: Join our dynamic study group focused on R and Python Shiny development! Whether you’re a beginner or an experienced coder, we collaborate, share insights, and tackle challenges in building interactive web applications. Dive into the world of Shiny, exchange best practices, and elevate your data visualization and application-building skills. Let’s explore the endless possibilities together in this supportive and knowledge-sharing community. Join us to amplify your Shiny expertise and contribute to an engaging learning environment! The book for the group is Mastering Shiny

title: R for Epidemiology
text: Join our study group focused on using R for epidemiology! Whether you’re a novice or an experienced epidemiologist, this collaborative space welcomes all. Explore R’s powerful statistical and data visualization capabilities tailored for epidemiological research. Discuss topics like data cleaning, statistical modeling, and creating compelling visualizations. Engage in practical exercises, share insights, and enhance your R skills within a supportive community. Let’s advance epidemiological research through the versatile and open-source capabilities of R. Join us to learn, collaborate, and apply R to make a meaningful impact in the field of epidemiology! The book for the group is R for applied epidemiology and public health

title: R for Data Science and Analysis
text: Join our study group for R Data Science and Analysis enthusiasts! Dive into statistical modeling, data visualization, and machine learning with R. Collaborate on real-world projects, share insights, and enhance your skills in a supportive community. Whether you’re a beginner or an experienced R user, our group offers a dynamic environment to explore the power of R for effective data analysis. Let’s learn, code, and grow together! The book for the group is R for Data Science

title: R for Econometrics
text: Join our R for Econometrics Study Group! Dive into practical applications of R in economic analysis. This group welcomes enthusiasts, from beginners to experienced users, to explore R’s powerful statistical and data visualization capabilities. Through collaborative sessions, we’ll enhance econometric skills, discuss real-world applications, and share valuable resources. Whether you’re into regression analysis, time-series modeling, or data visualization, this group offers a supportive environment to boost your proficiency in R for econometrics. Let’s unravel the insights hidden in data together! The book for the group is Introduction to Econometrics with R

title: R for Geospatial Analysis
text: Join our study group focused on leveraging R for Geospatial Analysis. Explore the integration of spatial data manipulation, visualization, and statistical modeling using R packages like sf, leaflet, and raster. Collaborate with fellow participants to tackle real-world geospatial challenges, from mapping to spatial analytics. Whether you’re a beginner or experienced R user, this group offers a supportive environment to enhance your geospatial skills and apply them to diverse domains. Join us to unlock the potential of R for spatial exploration and problem-solving. The book for the group is Geocomputation with R
